page.title: 17Children's Games
page.content: { Most parents and teachers would agree with the statement:- "Children watch far too much T.V. They have forgotten how to entertain themselves." However, a class of 10/11 year olds replied to this accusation with the following list of games played by them (excluding football,cricket etc.):- {"Around the world in 80 days,Aunts {and Uncles,Bulldog,Burning Acid,Cannon {Chicken,Conkers,Donkey,Follow the {leader,Four Legged Animals,Fox and {Hounds,Hide and Seek,Hopscotch,Ice {Cream,Jack-shine-the-Maggy,Kerby,Kick {the Can,Kingo,Knocky-9-doors,Marbles, {Murder in the Dark,Pig in the Middle, {Poison,Polo,Queeny,Red Letters,Red {Lights,Riot,Sardines,Skippy,Split the {Kipper,Spot,Stick in the Mud,Tally-0, {Tiggy,Two Baller." See Page 18 "Kerby"-How to Play.{
